subject: Football
Fireworks
Sports Injuries
Independence Day (US) (July 4)
lead_paragraph: Pierre-Paul, a defensive end who has been in a contract squabble with the Giants, was in the intensive care unit of a Florida hospital after a Fourth of July accident, teammates and media reports said.
snippet: Pierre-Paul, a defensive end who has been in a contract squabble with the Giants, was in the intensive care unit of a Florida hospital after a Fourth of July accident, teammates and media reports said.
